recipes.name: High Protein Oats & Berries Bowl
recipes.instructions: Mix oats with desired water amount and microwave 1-2 minutes. Stir in other ingredients.

recipes.name: Vanilla-Berry Protein Shake
recipes.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.
Notes
Use different protein powder flavors as desired.

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese Eggs & Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs with cottage cheese in a nonstick skillet. Toast the bread and spread avocado on top. Sprinkle with seasoning and serve.

ingredients.name: Egg whites or liquid egg whites

recipes.name: Blueberry Protein Pancakes
recipes.instructions:
Mix all ingredients (except syrup) into a smooth batter. Cook pancakes on a nonstick skillet until golden.
Meal Prep Tips
Can also be made as waffles. Batch cook, freeze, and reheat in toaster for easy prep.

ingredients.name: Egg whites or liquid egg whites

recipes.name: Egg Scramble & Toast
recipes.instructions: Sauté veggies and black beans in a nonstick skillet. Scramble in whole eggs and egg whites. Toast the bread and top with egg scramble. Optional: garnish with Cholula and minced cilantro.

ingredients.name: Egg whites or liquid egg whites

recipes.name: High Protein Yogurt Parfait
recipes.instructions: Mix yogurt, chia seeds and protein. Top with berries and almonds.

recipes.name: Veggie Egg White Frittata Muffins
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Spray muffin tin with nonstick spray. Heat nonstick spray in a skillet and sauté vegetables 3-4 minutes. Divide vegetables evenly into 4 muffin cups. Pour egg whites over vegetables and top with feta. Bake 20-25 minutes or until set.
Meal Prep Tips
Store in fridge for 4 days or freeze up to 1 month. Microwave ~30 seconds to reheat.

recipes.name: Egg, Avocado & Ham Veggie Bagel Sandwich
recipes.instructions:
Sáuté peppers/onions with spray 2-3 minutes. Add egg whites + egg; season and cook into patty. Warm ham 30 sec per side. Toast bagel and layer all ingredients on bagel.
Meal Prep Tips
Make 2-3 sandwiches, wrap in foil, refrigerate ≤3 days, reheat in toaster or air fryer ~3 minutes.

ingredients.name: Salt, pepper, everything but the bagel seasoning

recipes.name: Mexican Burrito Bowl
recipes.instructions: Layer rice and beans. Add chicken, peppers/onions, romaine, tomatoes, avocado. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime, and seasonings.

ingredients.name: Fresh cilantro + lime juice; salt & pepper
Spices: chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic/onion powder

recipes.name: Southwest Chicken Bowl
recipes.instructions: Add quinoa and sweet potatoes. Top with chicken, corn, beans, spinach. Finish with cilantro, lime, and season.

ingredients.name: Spices: smoked paprika, cumin, garlic powder

recipes.name: Mediterranean Power Bowl
recipes.instructions: Layer quinoa, chickpeas, spinach. Add chicken, cucumber, tomatoes. Top with hummus and tzatziki, lemon, herbs, and seasonings.

ingredients.name: Spices: oregano, basil, garlic powder, red pepper flakes

recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken, Veggies & Rice Bowl
recipes.instructions: Add rice, then chicken, broccoli, edamame. Drizzle teriyaki; add optional flavorings and seasonings to the chicken/vegetable mix.

ingredients.name: Flavoring: fresh garlic, fresh ginger, green onion garnish

recipes.name: Ginger & Garlic Salmon Bowl
recipes.instructions: Base of quinoa and spinach. Top with salmon, cucumber, edamame, onion. Drizzle soy and optional flavorings on salmon while cooking or over finished bowl.

ingredients.name: Flavoring: fresh garlic, fresh ginger, sesame seeds

recipes.name: Steak, Sweet Potato & Roasted Vegetables Bowl
recipes.instructions: Season and cook steak and vegetables with optional herbs. Arugula base. Add roasted vegetables, potatoes, and steak.

recipes.name: Caprese High Protein Chicken & Pasta Bowl
recipes.instructions: Season and cook chicken. Combine pasta, spinach, tomatoes, mozzarella, basil. Top with chicken; drizzle balsamic.

recipes.name: Salmon Sushi Bowl (Cooked)
recipes.instructions: Add rice and spinach. Top with salmon, edamame, cucumber, carrots, avocado. Add nori, soy, and seasonings/garnishes to taste.

ingredients.name: Flavoring: sesame seeds, fresh ginger, green onion garnish

recipes.name: Chicken, Sweet Potato & Black Bean Bowl
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken with spices. Place spinach in a bowl, add sweet potato, black beans, peppers, corn, chicken. Top with yogurt, cilantro, and lime.

ingredients.name: Spices: cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder

recipes.name: Chicken + Baked Potato + Green Peas
recipes.instructions: Serve chicken with baked potato (topped with Greek yogurt) and peas.

ingredients.name: Seasonings: garlic, parsley, lemon, G Hughes sugar free sauce

recipes.name: Salmon + Sweet Potato + Broccoli
recipes.instructions: Serve salmon with sweet potato and broccoli.

ingredients.name: Seasonings: dill, lemon, garlic, G Hughes sugar free sauce

recipes.name: Steak + Mashed Potatoes + Asparagus
recipes.instructions: Serve steak with mashed potatoes and asparagus.

ingredients.name: Seasonings: rosemary, thyme, garlic, G Hughes sugar free sauce

recipes.name: High Protein Pasta Bake
recipes.instructions: Mix pasta, marinara, cottage cheese, spinach, turkey. Place in baking dish, top with mozzarella; bake until bubbly.

ingredients.name: Garlic powder, onion powder, dried basil, dried oregano, salt & pepper

recipes.name: Chicken & Black Bean Enchiladas
recipes.instructions: Fill tortilla with chicken, beans, peppers/onions. Roll into dish, pour over sauce; bake to heat through. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime.

ingredients.name: Chicken - ground or lean chicken breasts
Spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika

recipes.name: Classic Tacos
recipes.instructions: Fill tortillas with meat, beans, peppers/onions, romaine, tomatoes, avocado. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime.

ingredients.name: Spices: chili powder, cumin, garlic powder

recipes.name: Spaghetti with Ground Turkey Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook turkey and then simmer in marinara. Serve over pasta with salad on the side.

ingredients.name: Garlic powder, basil, oregano, salt & pepper

recipes.name: Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry protein with veggies, soy sauce and seasonings. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: White Chicken Chili
recipes.instructions: Simmer chicken, beans, peppers, onion, broth and spices. Finish with yogurt and cilantro.

ingredients.name: Spices: cumin, garlic powder, smoked paprika

recipes.name: Chicken, Sweet Potato & Black Bean Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and black beans with spices in skillet. Warm tortillas; fill with sweet potato, beans, peppers, chicken. Top with cilantro and lime.

ingredients.name: Spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika

recipes.name: Chicken, Potato & Brussels Sprouts Sheet Pan
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Place chicken, potatoes, Brussels sprouts, and red onion on a parchment-lined sheet pan. Lightly spray or drizzle with olive oil and season. Roast 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway, until chicken is cooked and potatoes are tender.

ingredients.name: Spices: garlic, smoked paprika, thyme, rosemary

recipes.name: Classic Red Chili
recipes.instructions: Add all ingredients to crock pot; cook 4-6 hours. Top with yogurt and cilantro.

ingredients.name: Spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, salsa

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.instructions: Place chicken, peppers, onions, and seasonings in crock pot. Cook 4-6 hours. Warm tortillas; fill with crock-pot mixture, black beans, cilantro, and lime juice.

ingredients.name: Fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper
Seasonings: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, garlic

recipes.name: Chicken, Lentil & Vegetable Soup
recipes.instructions: Add all to crock pot; cook 4-6 hours on low until tender. Garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Chicken Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Slow-cook chicken with BBQ sauce; shred. Serve on bun with green beans on the side.

ingredients.name: Seasonings: smoked paprika, garlic powder; salt & pepper

recipes.name: Greek Chicken Powerhouse Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix greens, tomatoes, cucumber, chickpeas. Top with chicken and olives. Whisk yogurt, tahini, lemon, parsley; drizzle. Sprinkle nuts.

ingredients.name: Fresh parsley and greek seasoning, lemon, salt & pepper

recipes.name: High-Protein Chicken Caesar
recipes.instructions: Whisk yogurt, oil, lemon, Dijon, garlic for dressing. Mix greens, chicken, Parmesan. Drizzle dressing.

ingredients.name: Lemon juice, dijon mustard, garlic, salt & pepper

recipes.name: Quinoa Taco Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.

recipes.name: Salmon & Apple Power Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix greens, cucumber, onion, edamame, apple. Top with salmon, walnuts, feta. Whisk vinaigrette and drizzle on top.

ingredients.name: Dijon mustard, garlic, oregano; salt & pepper

recipes.name: Boiled Eggs, Edamame, Hummus & Veggies
recipes.instructions: Boil eggs in advance. Microwave frozen edamame and season (salt or Everything But The Bagel seasoning). Serve with hummus and fresh veggies for dipping.

recipes.name: Edamame Avocado Toast & String Cheese
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Microwave edamame. Spread avocado on toast, top with edamame and hemp hearts. Season as desired. Serve string cheese on the side.

recipes.name: Barebell Protein Bar & Protein Yogurt
recipes.instructions: Eat together as a high-protein, grab-and-go snack.

recipes.name: PBfit Banana Rice Cakes & Oikos Yogurt
recipes.instructions: Mix PBfit with water to form a spread. Spread onto rice cakes, top with banana slices, hemp seeds, and drizzle with honey. Serve yogurt on the side.

recipes.name: Tuna & Avocado Crackers Plate
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado and mix with tuna, onion, and celery. Season as desired. Serve with crackers and veggies or fruit on the side.

recipes.name: High Protein Mini Charcuterie Snack Box
recipes.instructions: Roll deli turkey or chicken into bite-sized rolls. Pair with cheese, crackers, hummus, and veggies. Add fruit if desired. Serve chilled.

ingredients.name: Nitrate-free deli turkey or chicken breast slices
Part-skim mozzarella or 2 light string cheeses

recipes.name: High Protein Berry Cheesecake Bowl
recipes.instructions: Blend yogurt, protein powder, and cottage cheese until creamy. Stir in berries and sprinkle with graham crumbs. Chill ~15 minutes before eating.

recipes.name: Apple Cinnamon Protein Parfait
recipes.instructions: Mix yogurt and protein until smooth. Layer with warm cinnamon-apple mixture. Sprinkle walnuts on top.

recipes.name: Ninja Creami Vanilla & Berries Frozen Yogurt
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Freeze in Ninja Creami pint container overnight. Spin once (re-spin with more milk if needed). Mix in or top with berries before serving.

recipes.name: Shrimp Cocktail with Avocado Rice Cakes
recipes.instructions: Prep shrimp or purchase pre-cooked. Spread avocado over rice cakes, sprinkle with hemp seeds. Garnish with lemon and parsley if desired. Serve with cocktail sauce.
